name: Welcome into my mind
description:
Walk around my dream and interact with the world to get out of it.

You wake up and discover the very place where I created this project, by diving you deeper, you will discover a little more about me ...

This is my first game created alone on Unity, during my training at Interface3

With the help of the pretty Ophélie Vandyck for the rigging & animation of my little doggo.

Music:

  • "Calm Synthesizer, B.wav" par InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) de Freesound.org
  • "Calm Synthesizer, C.wav" par InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) de Freesound.org
  • "Dark Synth.AIFF" par 5P4C3_C4173T de Freesound.org

Typography: Creslina de Dafont.Com
